Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: login(navController:authScope:redirectURI:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Starts an authentication process.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: isSessionValid()
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Returns whether a session is currently available or not.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: logout()
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Ends the current session.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: user(_:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: recentMedia(fromUser:maxId:minId:count:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get the most recent media published by a user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: userLikedMedia(maxLikeId:count:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get the list of recent media liked by your own user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: search(user:count:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get a list of users matching the query.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: userFollows(success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get the list of users this user follows.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: userFollowers(success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get the list of users this user is followed by.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: userRequestedBy(success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: List the users who have requested this user’s permission to follow.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: userRelationship(withUser:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a relationship to another user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: follow(user:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Follows the target user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: unfollow(user:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Unfollows the target user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: approveRequest(fromUser:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Approve the target user’s request.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: ignoreRequest(fromUser:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Ignore the target user’s request.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: media(withId:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a media object.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: media(withShortcode:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a media object.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: searchMedia(lat:lng:distance:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Search for recent media in a given area.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: comments(fromMedia:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get a list of recent comments on a media object.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: createComment(onMedia:text:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Create a comment on a media object.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: deleteComment(_:onMedia:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Remove a comment either on the authenticated user’s media object or authored by the authenticated user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: likes(inMedia:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get a list of users who have liked this media.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: like(media:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Set a like on this media by the currently authenticated user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: unlike(media:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Remove a like on this media by the currently authenticated user.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: tag(_:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a tag object.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: recentMedia(withTag:maxTagId:minTagId:count:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get a list of recently tagged media.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: search(tag:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Search for tags by name.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: location(_:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get information about a location.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: recentMedia(forLocation:maxId:minId:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Get a list of recent media objects from a given location.

Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.name: searchLocation(lat:lng:distance:facebookPlacesId:success:failure:)
Classes/Instagram.html#/s:14SwiftInstagr.abstract: Search for a location by geographic coordinate.

Classes/Instagram.html.name: Instagram
Classes/Instagram.html.abstract: A set of helper functions to make the Instagram API easier to use.
